GeneralInfo.Name: Black Glass
GeneralInfo.Author: Tgx
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
Developed for Mediaportal 1.1.0 final. The resolution is 1280x720 and scales well to full HD.
Black Glass skin is designed to be easy to use and has a simple and clear look. It should be controlled primarily with a remote or a keyboard.
BasicHome screen should be used as default home page.
The skin has been developed using Theatre as layout inspiration and Blue3Wide as codebase.
Hope you like it!
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Fix for overlapping overlay Fix for misplaced lyrics Fix for misplaced satellite images Myweather.xml alignment fix + tvsettings menu fix New windows opening/closing animations retaining background image instead of fading into black Added time info to settings screens + Fixed a lot of unused settings screens Added hover for Subcentral plugin Fix for Streamradio item count Mpei plugin labels update Fixed group view in tvseries Fix for wrong tvnow height in TvOSD Fix for wrong tvnow height in TvOSD with alternative osd packs Fix for mytrailers animations ShowTimes fix for left menu crashing MP + new place for film showtime infos in details view ShowTimes fix for animations of film showtimes infos in details view TvSeries: Added runtime, aired date and number of episodes to listview Realigned movie cover in movingpictures.details.xml MovingPictures: minor alignment enhancements MovingPictures: New movie start indicator Updated text colors in Miniguides Alternative OSD Bottom: added Onlinevideos support ShowTimes: animation fix + TvSeries: listview color fix Lastfm animation fix New gfx for virtual keyboard buttons Added support for New Episodes Indicator Image + Minor cosmetical fixes Fixed wrong facade in MyVideos poster view Disabled "scrollWrapString" property for buttons to prevent the flickering of the buttons in the left menus Added No Backdrops Mod for those who like a clearer look Added support for FritzBox Manager plugin RadioTime updated to the latest version Mpei plugin support updated to the latest version myLyrics.xml added seperators Fix for DTS logo in TVSeries.SkinSettings.xml Editor: Added custom background color choice feature Added support for TVSeries ClearArt in Info OSD Added TvSeries ClearArt support to alternative OSD Fixed missing time info Updated support youtube.fm Updated support for SleepControl Boxoffice info text placement changed in ShowTimesGUI.xml Fixed description not showing up in mytvprogram.xml Added support for the plugin "Stock & Indices" Minor Restyling of BasicHome/Home screens. Restyling of media playing icons (play, stop, ffd ...) and involved screens Animation fix for BasicHome.xml and mytvguide.xml New rating star gfx New opening and closing screen animation system. Enhanced skin file organization. Removed unnecessary files. Basic Home code simplification. MyHome time fix. Fixed menu in SleepControl, Added HNBTecaj skin files Fixed setting screens title label width Added support for the UpdateControl plugin Fixed facade background issue with UpdateControl.xml Fixed Geckobrowser running only once Fixed filmstrip facade animation issues Added translations for "Recently Added" tv series text line in basic home Fixed album scrolling info in last.fm plugin Editor: Fixed bug with custom plugin data at loading point

SectionParam.Name: Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.
